channel.title: macosx on Kishan B
channel.description: Recent content in macosx on Kishan B

item.title: Backup and restore all your apps in Mac OS
item.description: Prerequisite This assumes you are installing everything using homebrew as a practice. If you are not doing it already, getting started is as easy as it gets. Some Search for an app(cli/gui) brew search <<app>> To install a cli app brew install <<cli app>> To install a GUI app brew install --cask <<gui app>> Backup all your apps (cli and gui) brew bundle dump This will output a file called Brewfile whose contents will look like the following
